DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study was to rule out a greater than 10% incidence of hypersensitivity to Vitrase following a single intradermal injection of 3 USP units Vitrase. Less than or equal to 10% hypersensitivity response was considered acceptable.
DOC.criteria: Avoid disallowed meds throughout study Known hypersensitivity to hyaluronidase and/or bee sting Atopic individuals assessed by med history Topical/systemic corticosteroids within 30 days Concurrent use of antihistamines or antiinflammatory during study Active or chronic disease likely to affect immune function History of alcohol/drug abuse within 6 months
